name: Make Vulnerable
desc: cancels all cold and heat resistance

name: Missile
desc: 1 damage

name: Heavy Missile
desc: 2 damage

name: Icicle
desc: 2 damage unless cold resistant, does not cancel

name: Spark
desc: 2 damage unless heat resistant, does not cancel

name: Lightning Bolt
desc: 4 damage

name: Explosion
desc: 3 damage

name: Fireball
desc: 4 damage unless heat resistant, cancels with Ice Shards

name: Ice Shards
desc: 4 damage unless cold resistant, cancels with Fireball

name: Destroy
desc: removes all creations from Creation spells

name: Ice Storm
desc: 5 damage to everybody unless cold resistant, cancels with Fire Storm

name: Fire Storm
desc: 5 damage to everybody unless heat resistant, cancels with Ice Storm

name: Focused Elemental Storm
desc: 4 damage unless heat resistant, 4 damage unless cold resistant

name: Cause Wounds
desc: 2 damage, difficult to block

name: Finger of Death
desc: instantly kills target

name: Summon Ogre
desc: ogre has 2 health and does 2 damage

name: Summon Goblin
desc: goblin has 1 health and does 1 damage

name: Summon Ice Elemental
desc: elemental has 4 health and does 4 damage, cold resistant, can also be instantly destroyed by any fire spell

name: Summon Fire Elemental
desc: elemental has 4 health and does 4 damage, heat resistant, can also be instantly destroyed by any ice spell

name: Summon Skeleton
desc: skeleton has 3 health and does 3 damage

name: Helping Hand
desc: create a third hand to cast spells with for 5 turns (with 5 health)

name: Summon Giant
desc: giant has 4 health and does 4 damage

name: Clone
desc: create two extra hands to cast spells with until clone (with 5 health) is destroyed by opponent

name: Endless Cloning
desc: casts "Clone" every turn

name: Freeze Time
desc: caster immediately gets one extra action

name: Anti-Spell
desc: cancels all spells currently being made (target must start over any spells in the process of being cast)

name: Paralysis
desc: freezes one hand in its current position, forcing it to stay that way for the next spell

name: Poison
desc: deals 2 damage per turn until removed via any spell that specifies removal of enchantment

name: Haste
desc: caster gets two actions per turn, for 3 turns

name: Amnesia
desc: target must repeat the actions it made in the previous turn

name: Plague
desc: kills target in 6 turns if not cured by any spell that specifies removal of enchantment

name: Charm Wizard
desc: caster is granted control of one of the target's hands / attacks, and may manipulate it in whatever way caster desires

name: Absolute Magical Energy
desc: TODO multiplies all damage of caster's spells by 10, and divides damage of all spells on caster by 10 (rounded up)

name: Surrender
desc: immediately ends game; whoever makes this gesture loses and it applies no matter in what context the gesture was made. Be careful not to accidentally surrender!

name: Stab
desc: always deals 1 point of damage regardless of other spells that turn. Effective Pow of 1; only one stab per wizard per turn

name: Chill
desc: provides heat resistance for 3 turns

name: Warmth
desc: provides cold resistance for 3 turns

name: Calmness
desc: heals 1 health point

name: Resist Heat
desc: provides heat resistance until removed by opponent

name: Enduring Shield
desc: cancels all spells cast by non-target on target with Pow of 1 or less for 3 turns

name: Shield
desc: cancels all spells cast by non-target on target with Pow of 1 or less

name: Resist Cold
desc: provides cold resistance until removed by opponent

name: Magic Mirror
desc: reflects all spells cast by non-target on target with Pow of 3 or less

name: Cure Wounds
desc: heals 2 health points

name: Anti-Magic
desc: cancels all spells cast by non-target on target with Pow of 2 or less

name: Anti-Magical Aura
desc: cancels all spells cast by non-target on target with Pow of 2 or less for 3 turns

name: Temperature Regulation
desc: provides heat and cold resistance until removed by opponent

name: Reinvigorate
desc: heals 3 health points and removes all Enchantment spells currently taking effect on target

name: Absorb Magic
desc: cancels all Attack spells cast by non-target on target with Pow of 3 or less

name: Magic Discharge
desc: removes all Enchantment spells currently taking effect on target

name: Disenchantment
desc: cancels all Enchantment spells cast by non-target on target with Pow of 3 or less

name: Divine Fortification
notation: Target[Self] Heal[3] Cancel[A] Cancel[E] Resist[Heat] Resist[Cold]
desc: heals 3 health points, cancels all Attack spells and Enchantment spells cast by non-target on target, provides heat and cold resistance until removed by opponent

name: Dispel Magic
desc: cancels all Attack spells and Enchantment spells cast by non-target on target

name: Invulnerability
desc: makes target immune to damage. Can still be killed with non-damaging spells, ex. Finger of Death, Plague, self-Surrender, etc.
